Headline: #3 King Drive & #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Adams
ShortDescription: Northbound #3 King Drive & #4 Cottage Grove buses are temp rerouted via Michigan, Adams, Dearborn, Wacker & Michigan, due to street blockage near Michigan/Adams

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #3 King Drive & #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Adams, Dearborn, Wacker & Michigan, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Michigan/Adams.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with delays at Damen due to debris on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with delays at Damen due to debris on the tracks.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
